mods:mods.mods:note: Shows building construction by hand coloring, locations of windows and doors, and available water facilities.Shows factories, commercial and religious occupancy of buildings, dwellings with property boundaries and house and block numbers.Title page, which includes a sheet index, is on an additional, unnumbered sheet.Index to streets and maps: p. [1].Historical maps of neighborhoods, detailed at the block and building level, showing residential, commercial, and industrial uses of site, building footprints, potential environmental hazards, and construction details of structures.Includes notes on population, water facilities, fire department, and prevailing winds.Microfilm edition known as: Sanborn fire insurance maps
mods:mods.mods:abstract: 1 map on 41 sheets : col. ; sheets 65 x 54 cm
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: You can, without permission, copy, modify, distribute, display, or perform the Item, for non-commercial uses. For any other permissible uses, please review the terms and conditions of the organization that has made the Item available.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Building Colorado Story by Story: The Sanborn Fire Insurance Maps Collection

mods:recordInfo.mods:recordOrigin: Metadata provided by the University of Colorado Boulder Libraries.
